commit.message:
Add rustfix tests for mistyped_literal_suffix lint

This moves all `mistyped_literal_suffix` tests to their own file and
enables rustfix tests for them.

cc #3603, #2038

Based on #3887

Add rustfix tests for mistyped_literal_suffix lint

This moves all `mistyped_literal_suffix` tests to their own file and
enables rustfix tests for them.

cc #3603, #2038

Based on #3887
